short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension for blocking websites to keep you in zen mode

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An open source extension that allows you to block websites (up to 5000) with capability for searching blocked websites, temporarily disable website blocking to allow you to indulge yourself in distractions.
